member.name: M:ThreadingTest1.Form1.ThreadWorker(System.String)
member.param: Name of the thread. Used for ID, control and resource sharing.

member.name: T:ThreadingTest1.ThreadControlObject
member.summary: This class stores information about a thread's state. It is shared between the GUI thread and the worker thread.

member.name: P:ThreadingTest1.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ThreadingTest1.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ThreadingTest1.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
